name: 2024 2nd International Conference on Computer Graphics and Image Processing
content: Paper Publication: The papers will be peer-reviewed by 2-3 Technical Committee members or reviewers in the related fields. All accepted (Registered & Presented) papers of CGIP 2024 will be published into CGIP 2024 CPS Conference Proceedings, which will be submitted to IEEE Xplore, and subitted to be indexed by Ei Compendex and Scopus.
